name: GIAnt fight - AIaG
description:
After the mysterious giant appeared everyone fled the village, you are the only one left. Use your agile body to dodge the giant's attacks and get on top of his body. If you make a noise by falling from a high place, you'll only lure him.

Having a difficulty locking the mouse cursor in? My bad. Try the .exe version below

Use WASD + SPACE + MOUSE to walk/climb. ESC to capture the mouse cursor. Additionaly use F to toggle freecam mode. There is no particular goal, just have fun with the movement and giant AI.

Made for the AI and Games Jam 2021

Music: 弔い合戦 (Mourning battle) - Next Arco Recordings
